question: The Mouling National Park (MNP) is located in which state?
explanation: The Mouling National Park (MNP) is a national park spread over the Upper Siang district and parts of the West Siang and East Siang district of Arunachal Pradesh and covers an area of about 483 kmÂ². It is home to  takin, goral, Indian leopard, Bengal tiger, barking deer, serow and red panda.
